entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
